histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.Messages.Role
histogram.summary: This is recorded for each message provided to a LanguageModel `prompt` or `append` invocation. It can be used to measure the usage of the `role` of individual messages.

histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.Messages.Text.Length
histogram.summary: This is recorded for each message content provided to a LanguageModel `prompt` or `append` invocation. It can be used to measure the usage of the text length of individual messages.

histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.Messages.Type
histogram.summary: This is recorded for each message content provided to a LanguageModel `prompt` or `append` invocation. It can be used to measure the usage of the `type` of individual messages.

histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.{LanguageModelFunctionName}.TemperatureX1000
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the LanguageModel `create` or `availability` function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `temperature` option. It is only recorded when the option is set. The value is multiplied by 1000 to support floating point metrics. The value is in the range 0 to ~2000.

histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.{LanguageModelFunctionName}.TopK
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the LanguageModel `create` or `availability` function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `topK` option. It is only recorded when the option is set.

histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.{LanguageModelFunctionName}.{LanguageModelExpectedInputOrOutput}.Language
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the LanguageModel `create` or `availability` function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of specified expected input or output languages. option. It is only recorded when the language(s) are specified.

histogram.name: AI.LanguageModel.APIUsage.{LanguageModelFunctionName}.{LanguageModelExpectedInputOrOutput}.Type
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the LanguageModel `create` or `availability` function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `temperature` option. It is only recorded when the option is set.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.ContextTime
histogram.summary: Measures the time it takes to process prompt input. This is recorded each time a prompt is added.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.ContextTokens
histogram.summary: Measures the size of the prompt in tokens. This is recorded each time a prompt is added.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.Crashed
histogram.summary: Records whether the model crashed while a session was active. Recorded each time a session is destroyed.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.FirstResponseTime
histogram.summary: Measures the time it takes until the first tokens of the response are received. This is recorded each time the model gives a response.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.PromptRequestSize
histogram.summary: Measures the size of the prompt request in bytes. This is recorded each time when the model is executed.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.PromptResponseCallbackCount
histogram.summary: Measures the number of times that the callback is triggered in one prompt request. This is recorded each time when the model execution completes.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.PromptResponseSize
histogram.summary: Measures the size of the prompt response in bytes. This is recorded each time when the model execution completes.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.PromptResponseStatus
histogram.summary: Records the final response status for each prompt request. This is recorded each time when the stream completes or encounters errors.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.ResponseCompleteTime
histogram.summary: Measures the time it takes until the full response is complete. This is recorded each time the model gives a response.

histogram.name: AI.Session.{SessionType}.ResponseTokens
histogram.summary: Measures the number of tokens in the completed response. This is recorded each time the model gives a response.

histogram.name: AI.Summarizer.APIUsage.{WritingAssistanceFunctionName}.CoreOptionType
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the WritingAssistance function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `type` option.

histogram.name: AI.Translation.LoadTranslateKitErrorCode
histogram.summary: Records the error code of a failed attempt to load the TranslateKit binary for on-device translation. It may happen when browser tries to initialize the OnDeviceTranslationService. This is only logged on Windows. See on_device_translation::TranslateKitClient for more details.

histogram.name: AI.Translation.LoadTranslateKitResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of an attempt to load the TranslateKit binary for on-device translation. It is logged when browser tries to initialize the OnDeviceTranslationService. See on_device_translation::TranslateKitClient for more details.

histogram.name: AI.{SessionType}.AvailabilityV2
histogram.summary: Records the availability of model execution as returned in methods like `LanguageModel.availability()`.

histogram.name: AI.{WritingAssistanceType}.APIUsage.{WritingAssistanceFunctionName}.CoreOptionFormat
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the WritingAssistance function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `format` option.

histogram.name: AI.{WritingAssistanceType}.APIUsage.{WritingAssistanceFunctionName}.CoreOptionLength
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the WritingAssistance function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `length` option.

histogram.name: AI.{WritingAssistanceType}.APIUsage.{WritingAssistanceFunctionName}.CoreOptionTone
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the WritingAssistance function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the `tone` option.

histogram.name: AI.{WritingAssistanceType}.APIUsage.{WritingAssistanceFunctionName}.{LanguageMetric}
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time when the WritingAssistance function is invoked. It can be used to measure the usage of the language options.
